segments.text: Sometimes I think television is too biased . None of them are completely objective .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's unavoidable , but think , How would you keep up to date without television ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Newspapers or the radio I guess . I just wish TV was more objective .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , you can still learn a lot from watching television , you just need to be smart when you're watching . Filter the information and decide if you believe what you are hearing or not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's no one moderating it . Anyone around the world can put information onto the net for anyone else to see . The information on the internet is mostly unsubstantiated and you can never know who has written it , or why . A lot of people get conned online .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Again , you need to think carefully . If you don't trust others online , have nothing to do with them .
segments.speaker: S2
